artist: Editor: Cornelis Ploos van Amstel; Etcher: Bernhard Schreuder; Painter: After Jan de Bray
description: group of five men seated at a table covered with a large fringed rug; wearing hats with tall crowns,cloaks with square white collars; one man standing behind the table is plainly dressed and holding something below table level in right hand
inscription:
Inscription

in image on chair back in black: JDBray 1663  | on sheet in pencil below image: de Bray  Ploos van Amstel / on verso: 1-178
title: Directors of the Orpphan Asylum of Haarlem
